H0.text: Which American resort is nicknamed 'Sin City'. New Orleans

H1.text: Which American resort is nicknamed 'Sin City'. Atlantic City

H2.text: Which American resort is nicknamed 'Sin City'. Miami

H3.text: Which American resort is nicknamed 'Sin City'. Vegas

A4.text: The city's tolerance for numerous forms of adult entertainment has earned it the nickname 'Sin City'.

A5.text: Las Vegas has earned the moniker 'Sin City'.
